content: Perhaps as the hoard of zombie start breaking into the house, a fire starts. The bed and breakfast starts becoming engulfed by flames. Edgar and Rachel must flee. We can get an emotional moment where Edgar looks around at the living room that if filling up with fire and zombies. He knows he must leave. He shouts for Rachel, but she's not there. He instinctively knows where to find her. He hurries upstairs to the room that Chris, Anna, and Indy were allowed to enter. It is Edgar and Rachel's deceased daughter's bedroom. Rachel lays on the bed, crying, not wanting to leave the bedroom behind. Edgar must convince her to leave. She is super reluctant. He grabs a photo album from beneath the bed. It is filled with photos of them and their daughter. Rachel grabs the photo album from him and clutches it. He lifts Rachel up and carries her out of the burning house.
